title: Senator Sherry Rehman commends Pakistan Army’s valour in Orakzai operation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 08 (APP):Senator Sherry Rehman, Vice President of the Pakistan People’s Party (PPP), on Wednesday lauded the Pakistan Army’s successful operation in Orakzai that eliminated 19 terrorists, calling it a powerful demonstration of courage and determination.
Condemning the cowardly attacks by terrorists backed by India, Senator Sherry Rehman said, “We strongly condemn these brazen assaults on our security forces. Our brave soldiers fought valiantly, sacrificing their lives so that no harm would come to the homeland.”
Paying tribute to the martyrs, she expressed national pride in their sacrifice. “The entire nation is proud of Lieutenant Colonel Junaid Arif, Major Tayyab Rahat, and other gallant martyrs who laid down their lives in the service of Pakistan,” she said. “Their sacrifices will forever live in the hearts of our people.”
The Senator emphasized that the martyrs’ legacy strengthens Pakistan’s resolve. “The conspiracies of those who wish harm to our nation will never succeed. Our security forces stand like a wall of steel against terrorism supported by foreign powers,” she stated.
She added, “The courageous forces of Pakistan, along with fearless citizens, will continue to thwart every plot of terrorism to ensure peace and stability for our country.”
